title: New attack move binding feature doesnt work?
body: in the patch notes it says we can now bind attack move to left click but when i tried to rebind the control it still doesnt work

replies.body:
How are you rebinding the left-click?  If your settings are not saving then your config may corrupt.  A config reset should fix that:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

I hope that helps!

its not that it isnt saving, the rebind window that pops up doesnt even register the left click, lets me bind it to shift+left click but not left click on its own
should also say that i can bind and save settings fine 
also it seems that nothing can be bound to left click only
There's a specific check box to do this. In hotkeys, scroll all the way down and you'll find it.
it only shows up while in game, so you cant change it from the home screen
I'm used to doing all of that in game anyways. xD
seems i figured it out......the setting option is only available in game and not from the home screen.....what ever happened to attention to detail?
